title: Accessories for connection
fullText:
Cord extension sets shall be fitted with the following accessories for connection:
(a)	A plug in accordance with—
(i)	AS/NZS 3112;
(ii)	AS/NZS 3123; or
(iii)	IEC 60309-2.
(b)	A cord extension socket in accordance with—
(i)	AS/NZS 3120;
(ii)	AS/NZS 3123; or
(iii)	IEC 60309-2.
Double adaptors and 3-pin plug adaptors (piggyback) or similar fittings shall not be used on construction and demolition sites.
